data.name: Rose Public School
data.text: The first ever school of my life, did not last long enough but sparked my interest in Science. I will write something more about it when I remember...

data.name: Kendriya Vidyalaya No. 1 AFS Darbhanga
data.loc: Air Force Station, Darbhanga, Bihar, India
data.text: The other half of my school journey. Not a single regret joining this school. Best 6 years of my life, from making the best friends to learning the best thing, the art of programming!

data.name: Birla Institute of Technology
data.text: The college life, simple 4 years clearing the course and improving my skills day by day.
